HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup.hh

00001 #ifndef _HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup_hh_
00002 #define _HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup_hh_
00003 #include "MappingAndAlignment.hh"
00004 #include <HcalCellIndex.hh>
00005 #include <stdexcept>
00006 
00007 namespace CALICE {
00012 class HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup
00013 {
00014 public:
00015   void createIndexReverseLookup(const MappingAndAlignment &mapping);
00016 
00017   inline pair<UInt_t, UInt_t> getModuleAndCellIndex(const MappingAndAlignment &mapping, const HcalCellIndex &a_cell_index) const 
00018   {
00019     const unsigned short layer_i=a_cell_index.getLayerIndex();
00020     const unsigned short tile_row_i=a_cell_index.getTileRow();
00021     const unsigned short tile_column_i=a_cell_index.getTileColumn();
00022     if (layer_i>=_cellIndexArray.size()
00023         || tile_row_i>=_cellIndexArray[layer_i].size()
00024         || tile_column_i>=_cellIndexArray[layer_i][tile_row_i].size()) {
00025       return make_pair(0xFF, 0xFF);     
00026     }
00027     const unsigned _index=_cellIndexArray[layer_i][tile_row_i][tile_column_i];
00028     const unsigned short cell_index = _index & 0x00FF;
00029     const unsigned short module_index = (_index & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00030     return make_pair(module_index, cell_index);
00031   };
00032 
00033 protected:
00034   typedef SimpleArray_t< SimpleArray_t< unsigned short > > CellIndexArray_t;
00035   SimpleArray_t< CellIndexArray_t > _cellIndexArray; 
00036 };
00037 }
00038 #endif
